title: League stupid ass client not popping up for "accept match" and "ban champion".
body:
Ur stupid ass client is so full of shit. All the milions of dollars u get from stupid skins u cant invest a bit to finaly fix ur damn shitty client. 
Of all games i played League is the one that can coupe with Warframe togeather with the numbers of bugs, glitches, tehnical issues. I fail to accept the match or ban a champion because the client doesent pop up, this i lose LP, get Que penalty for 30min AND THIS ALL HAPPENS TO MY FRIEND ALSO!!!!!
 Da fuck with u lazy %%%gots riot, u are full of shit.

replies.body: When you enter the queue as well as entering champion select, your network is talking to the servers to get grouped with everyone into the same room.  A bad connection can cause you to lose sync or get left behind entirely.  While I understand you might be able to play other games without issue, you can still specifically have issues connecting to a specific server.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, following each step to get this resolved.  Good luck!
Porocles being the man here and fighting hate with love. my man.
